Function reference

Downloading and Processing Data: Climate and Environment

download_climate_data()
Download and Save Climate Data for Multiple Countries (Parquet Format, Multiple Models and Variables)
get_DMI_forecast()
Get DMI (Dipole Mode Index) Forecast Data
get_DMI_historical()
Download and Process Historical DMI Data
get_ENSO_forecast()
Get ENSO (Niño3, Niño3.4, and Niño4) Forecast Data
get_ENSO_historical()
Download and Process Historical ENSO Data (Niño3, Niño3.4, Niño4)
compile_ENSO_data()
Compile ENSO and DMI Data (Historical and Forecast)
get_climate_historical()
Get Historical Climate Data
get_climate_forecast()
Get Climate Forecast Data (Daily)
get_climate_future()
Download Future Climate Data for Multiple Locations (One Model at a Time)
download_country_DEM()
Download 1km DEM Raster for Multiple Countries and Save to Files
get_elevation()
Get Mean or Median Elevation from Downloaded DEM Data Using Country Boundaries

Downloading and Processing Data: Cholera Incidence, Disease Dynamics, and Population Characteristics

process_WHO_annual_data()
Download, Process, and Save Historical Annual WHO Cholera Data for Africa
process_WHO_weekly_data()
Process Weekly Cholera Data: Convert Country Names to ISO3 and Filter by AFRO Countries
process_demographics_data()
Process UN World Prospects Data for African Countries
process_OAG_data()
Process and Save OAG Flight Data for Africa
process_CFR_data()
Process Cholera Data to Calculate Aggregated Case Fatality Ratios and Fit Beta Distributions (2014-2024)
get_WASH_data()
Download, Process, and Save WASH Coverage Data
get_symptomatic_prop_data()
Get Symptomatic Proportion Data
get_immune_decay_data()
Get Immune Decay Data
get_suspected_cases()
Get Proportion of Suspected Cholera Cases and Save Parameter Data Frame
get_generation_time_distribution()
Estimate the Generation Time Distribution for Days and Weeks
get_vaccine_effectiveness_data()
Get Vaccine Effectiveness Data

Estimating model quantities

est_seasonal_dynamics()
Estimate Seasonal Dynamics for Cholera and Precipitation Using Fourier Series
fourier_series_double()
Fourier Series Model with Two Harmonics (Sine-Cosine Form)
est_mobility()
Fit Mobility Model Using Flight Data and Distance Matrices
est_WASH_coverage()
Estimate and Visualize WASH Coverage and Correlation with Cholera Incidence
est_symptomatic_prop()
Estimate and Visualize Symptomatic Proportion Data
est_immune_decay()
Estimate Immune Decay
est_vaccine_effectiveness()
Estimate Vaccine Effectiveness Decay Model

Shapefiles and Spatial Data Functions

download_africa_shapefile()
Download and Save Africa Shapefile
download_all_country_shapefiles()
Download and Save Shapefiles for All African Countries
get_country_shp()
Get a country shapefile from GeoBoundaries API
get_centroid()
Calculate the Centroid of a Country from its Shapefile
generate_country_grid_dist()
Generate a Grid of Points Within a Country's Shapefile Based on Distance
generate_country_grid_n()
Generate a Grid of Points Within a Country's Shapefile Based on Number of Points

Country Code Functions

convert_country_to_iso()
Convert Country Names to ISO3 or ISO2 Country Codes
convert_iso_codes()
Convert ISO3 to ISO2 or ISO2 to ISO3 Country Codes
convert_iso_to_country()
Convert ISO2 or ISO3 Country Codes to Country Names
iso_codes_africa
ISO3 Country Codes for All African Countries
iso_codes_africa_central
ISO3 Country Codes for Central African Countries
iso_codes_africa_east
ISO3 Country Codes for East African Countries
iso_codes_africa_north
ISO3 Country Codes for North African Countries
iso_codes_africa_south
ISO3 Country Codes for Southern African Countries
iso_codes_africa_west
ISO3 Country Codes for West African Countries
iso_codes_mosaic
ISO3 Country Codes for MOSAIC Modeling Framework
iso_codes_ssa
ISO3 Country Codes for Sub-Saharan African Countries
iso_codes_who_afro
ISO3 Country Codes for WHO AFRO Region Countries

Utility Functions

load_or_install_packages()
Load or Install Required Packages (with GitHub handling for mobility, propvacc, and MOSAIC)
get_paths()
Generate Directory Paths for the MOSAIC Project
get_ggplot_legend()
Extract the Legend from a ggplot Object
make_param_df()
Get Template for Parameter Values
set_root_directory()
Set Root Directory
set_openmeteo_api_key()
Set OpenMeteo API Key

Shiny Apps

run_WHO_annual_data_app()
Run Shiny Application for Visualizing WHO Annual Cholera Data in AFRO Countries

Plotting Functions

plot_CFR_by_country()
Plot Case Fatality Ratios, Total Cases, and Beta Distributions by Country
plot_ENSO_data()
Plot ENSO and DMI Data
plot_africa_map()
Plot Africa Map with Cholera Outbreak Countries
plot_generation_time()
Plot Generation Time as Gamma Distribution for Days and Weeks
plot_mobility()
Plot Mobility Data, Mobility Network, and Results
plot_shedding_rate()
Plot Shedding Rate as a Function of Environmental Suitability
plot_suspected_cases()
Plot Proportion of Suspected Cholera Cases
plot_vaccine_effectiveness()
Plot Vaccine Effectiveness and Beta Distribution
